RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Internal temperature
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how hot or cold their insides are for the prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Hot guts
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] insides are dangerously hot (60°C / 140°F), any prey inside of [PAWN_objective] is liable to suffer from heatstroke.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Warm
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] insides are warmer than usual insides (40°C / 104°F), prey inside may suffer from heatstroke after prolonged vore.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] insides are just as warm as any other pawns.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Cold
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] insides are colder than usual (12°C / 53.6°F), long vores may lead to pawns suffering from frostbite.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Freezer
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] insides are freezing (0°C / 32°F), some genetic mutation lowers [PAWN_objective] to freezing temperatures.
